name: D/D Dog
text: Once per turn, if your opponent Special Summons a Fusion, Synchro, or Xyz Monster(s): You can target 1 of those monsters; this turn, that face-up monster cannot attack, also its effects are negated.
pendulum_text: You can target 1 Fusion, Synchro, or Xyz Monster your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn, then destroy this card in the Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "D/D Dog" once per turn.
